医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
治疗方式影响晚期肺癌患者的感染情况肺部恶性肿瘤是老年患者中最常见和致命的癌症之一。研究表明，肺癌患者下呼吸道感染的发生率较高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Treatment-modalities-shape-in​​fection-profiles-in-advanced-lung-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Treatment-modalities-shape-in​​fection-profiles-in-advanced-lung-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96dc247c-db3e-4340-b2b9-62d0442f3e4a Tue, 06 Feb 2024 13:14:32 -0500 Treatment modalities shape infection profiles in advanced lung cancer patients
额外的手指和双心：科学家解读微小的突变如何破坏发育我们的基因组提供了适当生长和发育的指令。数以百万计的基因组开关（称为增强子）控制着基因表达的位置和时间，从而确保我们一生中在正确的时间在正确的细胞中产生正确的蛋白质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Extra-fingers-and-double-hearts-Scientists-decode-how-tiny-mutations-can-derail-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Extra-fingers-and-double-hearts-Scientists-decode-how-tiny-mutations-can-derail-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae397de0-78e3-4a6b-91da-e8580f6d5f43 Tue, 06 Feb 2024 13:09:32 -0500 Extra fingers and double hearts: Scientists decode how tiny mutations can derail development
研究揭示了转录因子在早期胚胎发育过程中的作用新的国际研究揭示了转录因子在早期胚胎发育过程中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Study-shines-light-on-the-role-of-transcription-factors-during-early-embryonic-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Study-shines-light-on-the-role-of-transcription-factors-during-early-embryonic-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=38583763-1058-4b6a-973b-ec7d0ea40463 Tue, 06 Feb 2024 13:02:18 -0500 Study shines light on the role of transcription factors during early embryonic development
减肥手术可以更有效地控制肥胖患者的高血压发生率根据今天发表在《美国心脏病学会杂志》上的一项研究，与单独使用降压药物相比，减肥手术在控制肥胖和高血压未控制的人群中更能有效地控制高血压发生率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Bariatric-surgery-more- effective-in-controlling-hypertension-rates-in-obese-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Bariatric-surgery-more- effective-in-controlling-hypertension-rates-in-obese-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13f68142-3805-4529-b177-046975606ff7 Tue, 06 Feb 2024 12:48:11 -0500 Bariatric surgery more effective in controlling hypertension rates in obese patients
微型成像设备可以推进胃肠道癌症的检测胃肠癌 (GC) 是最常见的癌症形式之一，占全球所有癌症死亡人数的三分之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Tiny-imaging-device-could-advance-胃肠道-癌症-检测.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Tiny-imaging-device-could-advance-胃肠道-癌症-检测.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6626040-0842-4b4e-994b-cd5071b34191 Tue, 06 Feb 2024 12:42:44 -0500 Tiny imaging device could advance gastrointestinal cancer detection
单细胞研究揭示了骨髓增生异常综合征表观遗传药物反应的线索由 Manel Esteller 博士领导的癌症表观遗传学小组牵头的 Josep Carreras 白血病研究所的研究人员以单细胞分辨率描述了化疗对骨髓增生异常综合征患者骨髓的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Single-cell-study-reveals-clues-to-epigenic-drug-response-in-Myelodysplasty-Syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Single-cell-study-reveals-clues-to-epigenic-drug-response-in-Myelodysplasty-Syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7a343628-1a3d-49fd-8016-51881982ada4 Tue, 06 Feb 2024 12:36:59 -0500 Single-cell study reveals clues to epigenetic drug response in Myelodysplastic Syndrome
个性化医疗为数百万炎症性肠病患者带来希望包括溃疡性结肠炎 (UC) 和克罗恩病 (CD) 在内的炎症性肠病 (IBD) 的患病率在全球范围内迅速增加，估计影响了 680 万人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Personalized-medicine-offers-hope-for-millions-with-itis-bowel-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Personalized-medicine-offers-hope-for-millions-with-itis-bowel-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b5700927-b364-4e3d-a845-06d9dad88496 Tue, 06 Feb 2024 11:56:02 -0500 Personalized medicine offers hope for millions with inflammatory bowel disease
研究表明，烧伤会破坏肠道粘液屏障并改变肠道微生物群在《烧伤与创伤》杂志上发表的一项研究 (doi:10.1093/burnst/tkad056) 中，研究人员采用了多种技术组合来分析烧伤损伤对小鼠肠道微生物群和粘液屏障的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Burn-injury-disrupts-the-intestinal-mucus-barrier-and-alters-gut-microbiota-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Burn-injury-disrupts-the-intestinal-mucus-barrier-and-alters-gut-microbiota-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b61b91cc-d1b6-457a-9a72-b7f199a33db9 Tue, 06 Feb 2024 11:50:34 -0500 Burn injury disrupts the intestinal mucus barrier and alters gut microbiota, study reveals
性传播感染对老年人构成新的威胁在世界一些地区，60 至 89 岁人群中艾滋病毒和其他性传播感染的发病率正在增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Sexually-transmissed-infections-pose-new-threat-to-aging-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Sexually-transmissed-infections-pose-new-threat-to-aging-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ba0b270-4858-4a3c-8f2c-98efb737d040 Tue, 06 Feb 2024 11:44:00 -0500 Sexually transmitted infections pose new threat to aging adults
RvT4分子增强人体对类风湿关节炎患者动脉粥样硬化的防御能力伦敦玛丽女王大学的研究人员发现，RvT4 分子可以增强类风湿关节炎患者身体对动脉粥样硬化（动脉硬化）的自然防御能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/RvT4-molecule-boosts-the-bodys-defenses-against-atherosclerosis-in-rheumatoid-arthritis-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/RvT4-molecule-boosts-the-bodys-defenses-against-atherosclerosis-in-rheumatoid-arthritis-fighters.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e60eeab-9282-4459-a0b6-ca3cb326e1a3 Tue, 06 Feb 2024 11:35:00 -0500 RvT4 molecule boosts the body's defenses against atherosclerosis in rheumatoid arthritis patients
